

# Hey there, I'm Nazar <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ABSphreak/ABSphreak/master/gifs/Hi.gif" width="32" height="32">
I am a software developer with a natural affinity for solving puzzles and riddles ‚Äî the passion behind my love for programming.¬†However, I also like to make things aesthetically pleasing, and that is the reason why I have some experience in UI/UX design, primarily through Figma and partially Miro. Check out my deliverables for [PawFood app](https://www.figma.com/file/3RS9n9i1alb0VKcLTzUOvo/PawFood?type=design&node-id=2%3A3929&mode=design&t=DsSyZsMX6Yr4tcnE-1) - my project from the Google UI/UX course.

On my [blog](https://nazcodeland.dev/blog), I go into further detail about about various aspects of software development that I've learned and continue to learn.
